Best Selection

Loaded Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookie Cups

Loaded Chocolate Chip Pudding Cookie Cups are decadent treats featuring soft, chewy cookie dough baked into cups and filled with rich, creamy pudding, creating an indulgent dessert experience.

Maple Dijon Apple Cider Grilled Pork Chops

These succulent pork chops are marinated in a sweet and tangy blend of maple syrup, Dijon mustard, and apple cider, then grilled to perfection for a deliciously caramelized finish.

Dirty Steve's Original Wing Sauce

This bold and zesty wing sauce combines a unique blend of spices and heat, delivering a rich, tangy flavor that elevates any chicken wing to a new level of deliciousness.

Elvis Pancakes

Elvis Pancakes are a decadent breakfast treat featuring fluffy pancakes topped with creamy peanut butter, sliced bananas, and a drizzle of honey, inspired by the King's favorite flavors.

Food Blog

Mexican Vegetables on Cornbread

Mexican Vegetables on Cornbread is a flavorful dish that combines vibrant, spiced vegetables like bell peppers, corn, and black beans with the soft, slightly sweet base of cornbread. Often topped with cheese and fresh cilantro, this dish is a delightful blend of textures and tastes, perfect for a hearty and satisfying meal.

Vegan Lentil Loaf

Vegan Lentil Loaf is a wholesome, plant-based dish made from a blend of lentils, vegetables, and savory seasonings, baked to a perfect, firm texture. This nutrient-rich loaf is often topped with a tangy tomato glaze, making it a hearty and delicious alternative to traditional meatloaf.

Baked Stuffed Artichokes

Baked Stuffed Artichokes are a delectable dish where tender artichoke leaves and hearts are filled with a savory mixture of breadcrumbs, garlic, herbs, and Parmesan cheese. Baked until golden and crispy, this dish offers a delightful combination of flavors and textures, perfect as an appetizer or a side dish.
